Title: Make revolution all one's life, read Chairman Mao's books all one's life
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The book is Volume 4 of the "Selected Works of Mao Zedong" (毛泽东选集 - Mao Zedong xuanji). The characters on the worker's coat, below right: Production Safety (安全生产 - Anquan shengchan).This is a print from the fifth edition (February 1965).
